contribution_desc: This paper presents a camera-based tracking system to support the concept of "interaction through video", or interacting with devices incapable of touch interaction (wall projection or laptop) or unavailable (crowded with people) through touch manipulation on mobile devices using computer vision.
tracking_accuracy: variable because of adjustable CD ratio
tracking_characteristic: Location 2D; Identity; Tracking devices only; Inside-out tracking
use_cases: Interaction with display at a distance;
contribution: Tracking technology; Interaction techniques; Use-case, application; Remote display content manipulation through touch on phone
